[00:03.52]Jessie Reyez：
[00:06.05]You're such a nice guy a nice guy
[00:10.16]You're faithful you don't lie
[00:13.19]After the club you go back home right
[00:17.29]Right
[00:19.09]Sike
[00:20.79]Suck my d**k you f**kin' suck man
[00:24.19]Suck my d**k you f**kin' suck man
[00:27.47]I hope that your heart get hit by a semi-truck
[00:31.01]Suck my d**k you f**kin' suck man
[00:34.59]I hop in your whip and take a sip then I gun it
[00:37.47]I don't I don't got much self-control I hope that you runnin'
[00:40.97]I'm bipolar with the switch up just as quick like you cummin'
[00:44.36]I don't I don't got much self-control I hope that you run it
[00:47.45]Eminem：
[00:47.63]I'm not a cheater but if I'ma be accused might as well be
[00:51.23]You tell me you'll take me back when hell freezes
[00:53.66]But females be Rushin' me outside my telly temptation overwhelms me
[00:58.19]Like my monthly bill from Sprint they chargin' me for a selfie
[01:02.52]Chargin' me so I gave my hotel key
[01:05.95]Eh I was tryna be nice
[01:07.72]Jessie Reyez/Eminem：
[01:08.20]You're such a nice guy a nice guy
[01:11.99]You're faithful you don't lie
[01:14.91]After the club you go back home right
[01:18.97]Right
[01:20.81]Sike
[01:22.58]Suck my d**k you f**kin' suck b**ch
[01:25.95]Suck my d**k b**ch you f**kin' suck man
[01:29.15]I hope that your heart get hit by a semi-truck b**ch
[01:32.79]Suck my d**k you f**kin' suck b**ch
[01:35.81]Jessie Reyez：
[01:36.12]I play your music while you suffer like I'm Carmichael Polar
[01:39.59]You tied up in the basement while I chill on your sofa
[01:42.95]La próxima yo sé que mejor me quedo sola
[01:46.51]Estas de buenas que yo ya vendí mi pistola
[01:49.65]Eminem：
[01:49.68]I'm an emotional wreck weak uh huh
[01:51.33]Everything over-affects me yeah
[01:52.98]When you joke it upsets me yeah
[01:54.78]You say I'm no good at sex
[01:56.22]And you think I'm gross and unsexy uh huh
[01:58.26]I need Scope 'cause my breath stinks yep
[01:59.85]You hope I choke on a Pepsi yep
[02:01.69]B**ch you was supposed to correct me oh
[02:03.58]Been textin' you since three I still get no f**king reply
[02:07.02]You say you sleep alone but yet your mattress is king size
[02:10.55]F**k you goin' in those knee-high boots
[02:12.48]Cut it out b**ch
[02:13.40]I doubt that you're goin' to house sit
[02:14.89]In that outfit no skin-tight Levi's
[02:17.83]Every word that comes out your mouth's a f**king lie
[02:20.52]Oh it's spring time time for you to have a fling like a slingshot
[02:23.97]You say don't come over 'cause you got pink eye
[02:26.26]But I think I got just the thing why
[02:28.21]Don't I bring my f**kin' bat and just swing by
data.trans:
[ti:Nice Guy (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Jessie Reyez]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.55]//
[00:01.98]//
[00:03.52]//
[00:06.05]你真是个好人 好人
[00:10.16]你很忠诚 从不撒谎 
[00:13.19]俱乐部的事情结束后 就直接回家 
[00:17.29]真的吗
[00:19.09]假的
[00:20.79]为我服务吧 小子
[00:24.19]为我服务吧 小子
[00:27.47]我希望你被两轮半拖车撞了
[00:31.01]为我服务吧 小子
[00:34.59]我跳进你的车里 小酌一杯 然后开枪
[00:37.47]我没有什么自制力 希望你赶快跑
[00:40.97]我很极端 变脸比翻书还快
[00:44.36]我没有什么自制力 希望你赶快跑
[00:47.45]//
[00:47.63]我不是骗子 就算被指控也无妨
[00:51.23]你跟我说等地狱结冰了 你会带我回去  
[00:53.66]但是在现实生活中 小妞们都涌向我  我身边充满了诱惑
[00:58.19]诱惑就像每月来自Sprint（通讯公司）的账单一样多 那些女人跟我要我的自拍照
[01:02.52]她们想用身体来作为对我的感谢 所以我给了她们我房间钥匙
[01:05.95]我尽量做个好人
[01:07.72]//
[01:08.20]你真是个好人 好人
[01:11.99]你很忠诚 从不撒谎
[01:14.91]俱乐部的事情结束后 就直接回家
[01:18.97]真的吗
[01:20.81]假的
[01:22.58]为我服务吧 碧池
[01:25.95]为我服务吧 小子
[01:29.15]我希望你被两轮半拖车撞了 碧池
[01:32.79]为我服务吧 碧池
[01:35.81]//
[01:36.12]我唱着你的歌 而你在受苦 好像我就是Carmichael Polar
[01:39.59]你被绑在地下室里 而我在你的沙发上放空自己 
[01:42.95]下次我就知道了 我最好还是一个人呆着
[01:46.51]你很幸运 我早就把我的枪卖了
[01:49.65]//
[01:49.68]我精神崩溃了 很脆弱 
[01:51.33]所有事情对我的影响都很大
[01:52.98]你的玩笑让我很不爽
[01:54.78]你说我不擅长男欢女爱
[01:56.22]你觉得我很粗俗 又不性感
[01:58.26]我需要跟你保持距离 因为我有口臭
[01:59.85]你希望我喝百事可乐被呛死
[02:01.69]碧池 你应该纠正我的
[02:03.58]从三点开始一直给你发信息 你也没有任何回复
[02:07.02]你说你是一个人睡 可你的床却是双人床
[02:10.55]你还穿着过膝靴
[02:12.48]把它剪了 碧池
[02:13.40]我怀疑你会不会去我家坐坐
[02:14.89]就穿着这身 没有紧身牛仔裤
[02:17.83]你嘴里说出来的每句话都是谎话
[02:20.52]春天到了 又到了你发情的季节了
[02:23.97]你说 别过来 你得了红眼病
[02:26.26]但我想我知道真实原因了
[02:28.21]别伤害我了 赶紧滚吧
